TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SqlCacheDependencyAdmin extends System.Object
public ref class SqlCacheDependencyAdmin abstract sealed

summary.span: 在使用基于轮询的依赖项时，执行 SQL Server 数据库上需要的管理任务以支持 类。

span.span: Performs administrative tasks required on a SQL Server database to support the class when using polling-based dependencies.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此类的方法以编程方式启用和禁用 SQL Server 数据库及其表以获取 对象更改通知。You can use the methods of this class to programmatically enable and disable a SQL Server database and its tables for object change notifications. 此外，此类还获取有关使用方法为数据库中的哪些表启用更改通知的信息 。In addition, this class obtains information about which tables in a database are enabled for change notifications using the method. 不过，还可以使用 Aspnet_regsql 命令行工具来管理 SQL Server 数据库及其表的更改通知。However, you can also use the Aspnet_regsql command-line tool to manage change notifications for a SQL Server database and its tables. > [!NOTE] > 若要调用此类中的任何方法，用于访问 SQL Server 数据库的帐户必须具有创建表和存储过程的权限。To call any of the methods in this class, the account you use to access the SQL Server database must have permissions to create tables and stored procedures. 若要启用对特定表的通知，您必须拥有在该表上创建 SQL Server 触发器的权限。To enable notifications on a specific table, you must have permissions to create a SQL Server trigger on that table. 有关如何在数据库上设置权限的详细信息，请参阅 SQL Server 文档。For more information on how to set permissions on a database, see the SQL Server documentation. 有关 ASP.NET 进程所使用的帐户的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 模拟](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/xh507fc5(v=vs.100))。For more information about the account used by the ASP.NET process, see [ASP.NET Impersonation](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/xh507fc5(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个简单的 ASP.NET 页面，用于启用和禁用 SQL Server 数据库表的更改通知。The following code example is a simple ASP.NET page for enabling and disabling change notifications on SQL Server database tables. 它使用 对象来管理名为的连接字符串中指定的数据库中的更改通知 `MyConnectionString` 。It uses the object to manage change notifications in the database specified in a connection string called `MyConnectionString`. 该示例包括两个文件：一个 .aspx 文件，用于定义用户界面，以及一个代码隐藏文件，其中包含 ASP.NET 事件的源代码。The example includes two files, an .aspx file that defines the user interface and a code-behind file containing the source code for the ASP.NET events. 第一个示例是用于定义用户界面的 .aspx 文件。The first sample is the .aspx file that defines the user interface. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/CS/cacheDependencyAdmincs.aspx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/VB/cacheDependencyAdminvb.aspx#10)] 第二个示例是代码隐藏文件，其中包含页面事件的源代码。The second sample is the code-behind file containing the source code for the page events. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/CS/cacheDependencyAdmincs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/VB/cacheDependencyAdminvb.aspx.vb#1)]

param.span: 用于与 SQL Server 数据库建立连接的连接字符串。

span.span: A connection string used to connect to the SQL Server database.

summary.span: 禁用指定数据库的 更改通知。

span.span: Disables change notifications for the specified database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从参数中指定的数据库中删除对更改通知的支持 `connectionString` 。The method removes support for change notifications from the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 运行 方法后， 如果想要为数据库重新启用更改通知，则必须运行方法。Once you have run the method, you must run the method if you wish to re-enable change notifications for a database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法禁用连接字符串所指定的数据库的更改通知 `MyConnectionString` 。The following code example uses the method to disable change notifications for the database specified by the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-vb[CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/VB/sqlcachedep2vb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 未能建立与数据库的连接。

span.span: A connection to the database could not be established.
-or-

exception.span: ASP.NET 应用程序的安全性上下文没有连接到数据库的权限。

span.span: The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to connect to the database.
-or-

exception.span: ASP.NET 应用程序的安全性上下文没有禁用数据库通知的权限。

span.span: The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to disable notifications for the database.

summary.span: 禁用 SQL Server 数据库表或数据库表数组的 更改通知。

span.span: Disables change notifications on a SQL Server database table or an array of database tables.

summary.span: 禁用 SQL Server 数据库表的 更改通知。

span.span: Disables change notifications on a SQL Server database table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为参数中指定的表禁用更改通知 `table` ，参数中必须有指定的数据库 `connectionString` 。The method disables change notifications for the table specified in the `table` parameter, which must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 使用 方法禁用表的更改通知后， 如果想要重新启用更改通知，则必须使用重载之一。Once you have used the method to disable change notifications for a table, you must use one of the overloads if you wish to re-enable change notifications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将禁用在连接字符串中指定的表的更改通知 `MyConnectionString` 。The following code example disables change notification on a table specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/CS/cacheDependencyAdmincs.aspx.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/VB/cacheDependencyAdminvb.aspx.vb#7)]

span.span: Disables change notifications on an array of SQL Server database tables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从参数中指定的表中删除更改通知 `tables` 。The method removes change notifications from the tables specified in the `tables` parameter. 这些表必须位于参数中指定的数据库中 `connectionString` 。These tables must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 使用 方法禁用表列表的更改通知后， 如果想要重新启用更改通知，则必须使用重载之一。Once you have used the method to disable change notifications for a list of tables, you must use one of the overloads if you wish to re-enable change notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从参数中指定的数据库添加对更改通知的支持 `connectionString` 。The method adds support for change notifications from the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 运行 方法后， 如果想要对数据库禁用更改通知，则必须运行方法。Once you have run the method, you must run the method if you wish to disable change notifications for a database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法为连接字符串指定的数据库启用更改通知 `MyConnectionString` 。The following code example uses the method to enable change notifications for the database specified by the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. summary.span: 连接到指定 SQL Server 数据库并为 更改通知启用指定数据库表。

span.span: Connects to the specified SQL Server database and enables the specified database table for change notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为参数中指定的表添加更改通知 `table` ，参数中必须有指定的数据库 `connectionString` 。The method adds change notifications for the table specified in the `table` parameter, which must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 使用 方法将更改通知添加到表后，若要禁用更改通知，则必须使用 重载之一。Once you have used the method to add change notifications to a table, you must use one of the overloads if you wish to disable change notifications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法在连接字符串中指定的数据库中的指定表上启用更改通知 `MyConnectionString` 。The following code example uses the method to enable change notifications on the specified table in the database specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/CS/cacheDependencyAdmincs.aspx.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/VB/cacheDependencyAdminvb.aspx.vb#7)]

summary.span: 连接到指定 SQL Server 数据库并为 更改通知启用数据库表的指定数组。

span.span: Connects to the specified SQL Server database and enables the specified array of database tables for change notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为参数中指定的表添加更改通知 `tables` 。The method adds change notifications for the tables specified in the `tables` parameter. 这些表必须位于参数中指定的数据库中 `connectionString` 。These tables must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 使用 方法向一组表中添加更改通知后，若要禁用更改通知，则必须使用 重载之一。Once you have used the method to add change notifications to a group of tables, you must use one of the overloads if you wish to disable change notifications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法对在连接字符串中指定的数据库中以分号分隔的列表中指定的表启用更改通知 `MyConnectionString` 。The following code example uses the method to enable change notifications on the tables specified in a semicolon-delimited list in the database specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. summary.span: 检索一个字符串数组，该数组包含 SQL Server 数据库中为更改通知启用的每个表的名称。

span.span: Retrieves a string array containing the name of every table that is enabled for change notifications in a SQL Server database.

returns.span: 一个字符串数组，其中包含 SQL Server 数据库表的名称。

span.span: A string array that contains the names of the SQL Server database tables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个字符串数组，该数组包含在 `connectionString` 为更改通知启用的参数中指定的数据库中的所有表的名称。The method returns a string array containing the names of all tables in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter that are enabled for change notifications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在连接字符串中指定的数据库中创建一个表的字符串数组，这些表已启用更改通知 `MyConnectionString` 。The following code example creates a string array of the tables enabled for change notifications in the database specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic.
